remarks: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitition. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement:
cbvexh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
cbvexh.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
cbvexh.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvexh $p |- ( E. x ph <-> E. y ps ) $.
